There are many kinds of tsukumogami. Often, they are born within very small communities, struggling to survive due to the harshness of their surroundings. They are quickly forgotten by their former masters, and stories of haunted objects quickly become lost over time. An amanojaku has recently reached Most-Wanted status in all nations, and she was last seen in your lands. She was an old ally of yours, helping your revolution during its early days. You heard reports that she was using powerful artifacts for her own benefits, and you know deep down that these artifacts are crying because of her reckless behavior.
Search for her, we must save those poor artifacts from her reckless hands!

A nation wide search has been conducted, but every time we confront her she always slips away. Our search parties will continue to try to subdue the amanojaku.
Give her asylum in our lands, we can bring her to our side once more.
